import React, {useContext, useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {GlobalState} from '../../../GlobalState' import axios from 'axios' function Cart(){ const state = useContext(GlobalState) const [cart, setCart] = state.userAPI.cart if(cart.length === 0) return

Cart Empty

return (
{ cart.map(product => (

{product.title}

$ {product.price * product.quantity}

{product.description}

{product.content}

{product.quantity}
X
)) }
) } export default Cart
